prompt: Create a futuristic registration form with black background and neon accents. Include text fields for full name, email, password, and confirm password with glowing neon blue borders and transparent backgrounds. Add neon pink 'Create Account' button with pulsating glow effect. Include 'Already have account? Sign In' link in neon green below button. Use centered, scrollable layout with wide padding. Title should use futuristic 'Orbitron' font in neon blue, input fields have floating labels with glowing effect.
